idea:
We love the Idea of Sports Gaming and Contests on Real life Matches and we have been doing it since being young Adults. But we realized that Sports Gaming or Fantasy Sports is restricted only to making Teams in various Team Sports. What about other aspects of Team Sports? What about Individual Sports?

Thus, we came up with the Idea of Sporket Games. Why restrict your skills and knowledge and passion for the game to just making Teams? We allow you take your call and select options on various other aspects of Real-Life Matches, using your Knowledge, Skill and Information. We pit you against other Sports Enthusiasts

and Fans, and set up competitions and contests based on Upcoming Matches, where you can test your skill and knowledge about a lot of aspects of various sports, including Individual Sports like Tennis.

Sporket games will give a one-of-kind and completely unique Gaming experience. Itâ€™s a totally new Idea, with no other competing platforms, and it is 100% Conceptualized, Designed and Made in India.
name: SPORKET GAMES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Doctors App - 

A platform for Patients to connect to near by Doctors, Pathology lab and Diagnostic Center. 

Patients would have option for Telemedicine with Doctors. 

Doctors would have an option to take appointment of patients and upload prescription and assign respective tests to Pathology Lab and Diagnostic Center.
name: Doctors App

idea: Indus Corporation is a leading distributor of global brands like Honeywell, Pepperl Fuchs, Envitec, City Technology & Autonics. We are based out of Mumbai, India & distribute our automation products all across India & other countries. We plan to scale up aggressively in online as well as offline space by digital brand promotion in online space, adding more SKUs & establishing regional offices.
name: Indus Corporation

idea: Nabstract.io is building a portfolio of network applications that provides developers of different industry verticals like gaming& media, industrial IOT, finance, healthcare, V2X platforms to use APIs that expose device, location, network quality, service experience & other network related parameters utilizing the public or private 5G network function capabilities. This abstraction layer from the Telco / 5G Network Service Providers using Nasbtract NEF APIs for network access, edge cloud and device context, is positioned to enable new service use cases, network automation & monetization value adds for its enterprise & cloud partners. Nabstract NEF is a critical building block in the Telco, Edge & Cloud Service Providers, Enterprise Customers B2B2X business models
name: Nabstract Technologies Private Limited

idea: PEDASSIST is a idea which aims at guiding parents about the early childhood brain development of a new-born.
